survey.question: What is the current state of your rabbit's appetite?
survey.description: Options: None (not eating), Low (eating a little bit), Normal (eating normally)

survey.question: Does your rabbit's stomach make loud gurgling noises or is it silent?
survey.description: Options:  Yes (make loud gurgling noise or no sound), No (make normal sound)

survey.question: Does your rabbit produce no poop at all or small, deformed poops?
survey.description: Options:  Yes (your rabbit's poops are small, deformed or no poops at all), No (your rabbit's poop doesn't change)

survey.question: Does your rabbit stand in a hunched posture?
Does your rabbit lose energy?
Does your rabbit constantly scratch its ears?
Does your rabbit constantly shake its head?
Does your rabbit have a crust forming somewhere on its body?
Does your rabbit drool?
Does your rabbit have any swollen areas on its body?
Does your rabbit have red ears
Is your rabbit trembling, shaking or experiencing loss of balance?
Does your rabbit suddenly lift its head?
Does your rabbit sneeze multiple times a day?
Does your rabbit have watery eyes?
Does your rabbit have runny nose?
How is your rabbit breathing?
Does your rabbit's head suddenly tilt?
How frequently does your rabbit pee?
survey.description: Options: None (Not peeing), Infrequent (normal), Frequent (peeing more frequently)

survey.question: Is your rabbit urine sludgy?
Is your rabbit urine bloody?
Does your rabbit lose weight signigicantly?
Does your rabbit have discharged eyes?
Do you notice any of your rabbit teeth are overgrown that are pointy, or curved in its mouth?
Does your rabbit have any lump?
Does your rabbit lose fur?
